channel.title: Life on Me & Life
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Me & Life

item.title: Negotiating With A Threenager
item.description: We Don’t Negotiate With Terrorists or Threenagers Now don’t get me wrong, we really can’t complain with George, he doesn’t have many tantrums at all. I’d like to lay claim to that being down to me, but in reality it’s Karen and her DNA. Today however was one of those, “How can I be so heartless?” moments, as today there was no negotiation, it really was “Our way or our way”.
